00031 // "calendar.php" -- I think it's best if you leave it inside the
00032 // "/jscalendar/" directory.  Just put here the correct path to it, such as
00033 // "../jscalendar/calendar.php" or something.

00035 
00036 // parameters to constructor:
00037 //     1. the absolute URL path to the calendar files
00038 //     2. the languate used for the calendar (see the lang/ dir)
00039 //     3. the theme file used for the clanedar, without the ".css" extension
00040 //     4. boolean that specifies if the "_stripped" files are to be loaded
00041 //        The stripped files are smaller as they have no whitespace and comments
